H0.text: The Alfred Hitchcock films Rebecca and The Birds were based on novels by which author. Daphne du Maurier

H1.text: The Alfred Hitchcock films Rebecca and The Birds were based on novels by which author. Agatha Christie

H2.text: The Alfred Hitchcock films Rebecca and The Birds were based on novels by which author. Jane Austen

H3.text: The Alfred Hitchcock films Rebecca and The Birds were based on novels by which author. Lady Browning

A4.text: When Alfred Hitchcock's The Birds was released in 1963, based on 'The Birds' (1952) by du Maurier.

A5.text: The Hitchcock film The Birds (1963) is based on a treatment of the short story of that name, as is the film Don't Look Now (1973).
